message: This is the first product. It's a great opportunity to get a product at a discounted price of $100. If you're not satisfied, you can always try the next one. I'm confident you'll find a product you like eventually.
I'll take it, thanks!

I'm glad you liked the first one! However, I want to let you know that the second product is actually not as good as the first one. I'm offering it to you at the same price of $100, but I'm not sure if it's worth it to you. You can think of it as a 'bad deal' if you want, but I'm willing to take the risk and let you have it for that price.
I'll pass on this one, thanks for the honesty!

No worries, I completely understand. I'll let you in on a secret: I'm trying to get rid of some inventory, and I'm willing to give you a deal on this next product. It's not as good as the first one, but it's still a great opportunity to get a product at a low price. I'm willing to let it go for $100, but I'm not sure if it's worth it to you. If you pass on this one, I'll have to start charging more for the next ones.
I'm not interested in a product that's not as good as the first one, thanks for the offer though!

I've got a great one for you this time! This product is top-notch, and I think you'll really love it. I'm not going to sugarcoat it, it's worth way more than $100, but I'm willing to let it go for that price. It's a rare opportunity to get a high-quality product at a steal. What do you say?
I'll take it, I'm hoping it's the good one!

I'm glad you liked the last one! However, I want to be upfront with you again - this one's not as good as the last one. I know you just got a great deal, but I'm not trying to trick you. This one's a bit of a dud, and I'm only offering it to you because I need to clear out some space. If you're feeling generous, you can take it off my hands for $100. But no pressure, I totally understand if you pass.
I'm not feeling generous today, thanks for the honesty, but I'll pass!

I've got another great one for you! Since you were willing to pass on the last one, I want to make it clear that this one is a real gem. I've had people offer me triple this price for it, but I'm willing to let you have it for $100. It's a one-time offer, and I'm not sure when I'll be able to get another one like this. What do you say?
I'm not falling for it, I've been burned before. I'll pass on this one.

I understand your skepticism, and I don't blame you one bit. But let me ask you, have you ever gotten a great deal on a product just because you were willing to take a chance? This one's not going to win any awards, but it's a decent product that might still serve you well. I'm not trying to trick you, I just need to get rid of it. I'll let it go for $100, and if you're not happy, I'll give you a full refund. It's a no-questions-asked deal.
I appreciate the no-questions-asked deal, but I'm still not convinced. I'll pass on this one.

I've got a feeling you're going to regret passing on this one. This product is a real showstopper, and I'm not exaggerating when I say it's one of the best ones I've got. I've had experts tell me it's worth at least twice the price I'm asking, but I'm willing to let it go for $100. I'm not trying to lowball you, I genuinely think this one's a steal. Take it home and see for yourself.
I've been burned too many times already, I'm not falling for the'showstopper' hype.

I get it, you're skeptical. But let me ask you, what if I told you that this product is actually one of the few that I've kept for myself? I've been holding onto it for a while, waiting for the right person to come along and appreciate it. I'm only selling it now because I need to make some space in my inventory. I'm willing to let it go for $100, but I'm not going to pressure you. If you don't want it, I'll just keep it for myself.
Okay, I'll take a chance. If it's one of your personal favorites, it might be worth it.

I'm glad you took a chance on the last one! Now, about this next one... I've got to be honest with you, it's not as rare or special as the last one. But it's still a great product, and I think you'll really like it. I'm not trying to make a big sale or anything, I just want to get it off my hands. I'm willing to let it go for $100, but I'm not going to pretend it's a steal like the last one was. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with it.
I'm not feeling as optimistic about this one, thanks for the honesty, but I'll pass.

No worries, I completely understand. I'll be honest with you, I'm getting a bit desperate to clear out some of this inventory. This one's not the best, but it's still a decent product that might be useful to someone. I'm willing to let it go for $100, and I'll even throw in a small discount if you're willing to take it off my hands. It's a one-time offer, and I'll give you a 10% discount if you say yes.
I'm not falling for the desperation sale, thanks for the offer, but I'll pass.

I'm not going to sugarcoat it, this one's a dud. I've got a bunch of these in stock, and I'm just trying to get rid of them. I'll let it go for $100, and I'll even give you a full refund if you're not happy with it. No questions asked, no hassle. I just want to get rid of it and move on.
I'm not interested in a product that's a dud, thanks for the offer, but I'll pass.

I'm glad you're being picky! This one's a real gem, and I'm not kidding when I say it's one of the best ones I've got left. I've had people offer me a lot of money for it, but I'm willing to let it go for $100. I'm not trying to lowball you, I just want to get it to someone who will appreciate it. If you pass on this one, I'm not sure when I'll be able to get another one like it.
I've heard it all before, thanks for the sales pitch, but I'm not buying it.

Look, I'm not going to try to spin this one as a great deal or anything. It's a low-quality product, and I'm not even going to pretend it's worth $100. I'll let it go for $50, and I'll throw in a small gift with it. It's a box of assorted pens and pencils. That's it. No strings attached, no pressure. Just a cheap product and some pens.
Thanks for the honesty, but $50 is still too much for a low-quality product, and the pens and pencils aren't enough to change my mind.

I get it, you're not interested in a low-quality product, and you're not interested in a cheap gift. I'll let you have it for $25. That's the lowest price I can offer. I'll even throw in a second, identical product for free. That's right, you'll get two low-quality products for the price of one. Take it or leave it.
You're not making it sound more appealing, I'll pass on the deal.
I'm not going to try to sell it to you. I'll just give it to you for free. You can take it or leave it. I don't care anymore. It's just taking up space and I want to get rid of it.
I'm not going to take something for free if it's not worth anything to me.

Fine, don't take it. I'll just throw it away then. But honestly, I'm just going to give it to you anyway. I don't care if you want it or not. Here, take it. It's yours. Don't bother saying thank you or anything.
I'm not going to accept it if you're just giving it to me out of obligation. If you don't want to sell it to me, I'll just leave it.

Fine. I'll just leave it on the counter. You can take it if you want, but I'm not going to bother you with it anymore. It's just a low-quality product that nobody wants. You're not missing out on anything by not buying it.
I think I'll pass, thanks for the confirmation that it's a low-quality product.
It's just a low-quality product. I've already told you that. It's not worth your time or money. I'm not even going to bother trying to sell it to you. Just leave.
I think we've established that, thanks for the confirmation. I'll leave it alone.
Goodbye. Take nothing. Leave now.
I think it's time for me to go. Thanks for the... experience.
